mapper.insert: INSERT INTO finmate.comment ( post_id, member_id, content, is_anonymous, parent_comment, created_at ) VALUES ( #{postId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{isAnonymous}, #{parentComment}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, post_id, member_id, content, is_anonymous, parent_comment, created_at FROM finmate.comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
SELECT comment_id, post_id, member_id, content, is_anonymous, parent_comment, created_at FROM finmate.comment ORDER BY created_at ASC
